name: Micro Revolution
description:
An Arcade style game created in 7 days for Icoso's second GeoJam. Take control of your robot and survive in several different genres to get a new high score!

Move: Arrows/WASD

Jump: Z

Attack: X

Pause: P

-----------------------------------------------

Leaderboards don't work in the WebGL version hosted on itch. If you wish to make use of this feature, please download the PC version or visit the Game Jolt page

Micro-Revolution - Game Jolt

(Note Leaderboards were updated after submission period. Sorry)
